r.d: Yaf is a PHP framework similar to zend framework, which is written in c and built as PHP extension
r.n: - Improve Yaf_Config parsing performance, if the wanted section was parsed, then overpass the rest sections - Now catchException will failover to the default moudle error handler - Added Yaf_View_Simple::clear - Support set default route by config(appliation.dispatcher.defaultRoute) - Support adding Yaf_Route_Map by config - Allow Yaf_View_Simple::get(void) - Fixed Bug that Yaf_Config_Ini will take part of the section - Fixed bug that yaf_config_ini_deep_copy is not much deepy. - Fixed bug Yaf_Route_Simple dont respect application.modules configure - Fixed some memory leaks
